org.jgentleframework.core.intercept.support
Interface Matcher<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of data need to be matches
All Known Subinterfaces:
FieldFilter, MatcherPointcut<T,V>, MethodFilter, ParameterFilter<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDefinitionMatcher, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherClassFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherConstructorFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherFieldFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherMethodFilter, AbstractDefinitionMatcherPointcut.DefinitionMatcherParameterFilter, AbstractMatcher, AnnotatedWithMatcher, ConstructorAnnotatedWithMatcher, FieldAnnotatedWithMatcher, MethodAnnotatedWithMatcher, ParameterAnnotatedWithMatcher, TrueFieldFilter, TrueMethodFilter, TrueParameterFilter, TypeAnnotatedWithMatcher
public interface Matcher<T>

Returns true or false for a given input.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Summary
 Matcher<T> and(Matcher<T> other)
          Returns a new matcher which returns true if both this and the given matcher return true.
 boolean matches(T obj)
          Returns true if this matches obj, false otherwise.
 Matcher<T> or(Matcher<T> other)
          Returns a new matcher which returns true if either this or the given matcher return true.
 

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(T obj)
Returns true if this matches obj, false otherwise.

and

Matcher<T> and(Matcher<T> other)
Returns a new matcher which returns true if both this and the given matcher return true.

or

Matcher<T> or(Matcher<T> other)
Returns a new matcher which returns true if either this or the given matcher return true.
